p:
Antiviral drugs recommended by the latest Chinese guidance
7 include interferon-Î±, lopinavir-ritonavir, arbidol, chloroquine phosphate and ribavirin. And favipiravir is recommended to be included in Chinese guidance.
13 Regarding to clinical researches, currently, the results of lopinavir-ritonavir, arbidol and Hydroxychloroquine sulfate on COVID-19 treatment have been reported in 6 studies. 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21
